definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: pipe, spout, conduit (so NH);—abs. [[וְיִגַּע בַּצִּנּוֹר]] 2Sa 5:8 (i.e., si vera l., of Jerus., but very dubious, cf. Dr HPS); pl. sf. [[קוֹל חִנּוֹרֶיְ]] Ps 42:8 the sound of thy (water-) spouts fig., of sluices of heaven opened, cf. [[אֲרֻבֶּה]], [[פֶּלֶג]].
